title: Check out Where the Green Grass grows
description:
Welcome to the Hilltop community! This second floor one bedroom condo in the Summit section of Hilltop is conveniently located in Brookhaven Boro. Bright and  spacious, this unit offers updated luxury vinyl plank flooring throughout the shared living room and dining area with large sliding glass doors leading from the living room to a deck/balcony.  The updated bath features a tiled tub/shower,and granite vanity. The nicely sized bedroom features a  large walk-in closet with plenty of space. Washer and dryer are included in the unit in a hallway closet area and a nicely sized storage closet of the main living area provides even more storage space! Community amenities include swimming pool, tennis courts, playground, and clubhouse. Convenient to downtown Media and West Chester with many fabulous restaurants and bars, shops, and local theater. Easy access to major roads and public transportation to center city Philadelphia. Schedule an appointment to see this lovely rental today!

title: Extra Large 1 Bedroom + Office Space in Rittenhouse Sq
description:
Luxurious one bedroom plus den in The Wilson, a boutique apartment building on the corner of 16th and Sansom Streets in the heart of Center City.
The home features an open kitchen with island, custom countertops and backsplash, stainless steel appliances and modern cabinetry. The bathroom is appointed in designer finishes and has a modern vanity and large walk-in shower. Additional highlights include a flat-panel wall-mounted TV, washer/dryer, excellent closet space, oversized windows and wood-style plank tile floors.
The Wilson has a secure entry system controllable by a panel in each unit and by each resident's smart phone. The building is wired for Comcast and residents pay electric, cable and Internet. Residents enjoy a central location less than 3 blocks from Rittenhouse Square, 2 blocks to the Market Street west office corridor, 2 blocks to The Avenue of the Arts, 1 block to Rittenhouse Row shopping and dining, and a plethora of restaurants and shops within close walking distance.
This property does not allow any pets.
Listing courtesy of Allan Domb Real Estate

title: Amazing Bi-Level Two Bedroom in Old City
description:
Bi-level living in the heart of Old City! This incredible walk-up 3rd and 4th floor unit boasts quintessential Philly charm. Enter through the secure, gated easement and up the stairs to the apartment of your dreams.
Upon entering you're greeted with wide pine plank floors, high ceilings and a decorative fireplace (1 of 2). This huge room also has a wall of useful built-in bookshelves complete with library ladder and access to a private deck perfect for morning coffee or container gardening!
Past the living room is a sunny galley kitchen next to a spacious dining room. This lovely room is ideal for entertaining with it's large windows and the second decorative fireplace with marble surround. Host dinner parties or board game nights, you have space for it all! This level also has a convenient half bathroom, closet and stacked laundry tucked away from view.
Upstairs you'll find an open loft bedroom with charming dormer window and access to the shared full bathroom. The second bedroom has a door for more privacy and another large dormer window. Both bedrooms are well sized and have closets.
At over 1400+ square feet, this unique unit in one of Philly's best neighborhoods won’t last for long! Walk to everything- restaurants, retail, theater, fitness, the Delaware river trail and public transit or enjoy easy access to I-95 and 676. This location can’t be beat! Schedule your showing today.
This property does not allow any pets.
Listed by Elfant Wissahickon Realtors

title: Luxurious 3BR/1.5BA newly remodeled house for rent by private owner!!!
description:
This is the one you've been waiting for! A wonderful opportunity to rent a stylish modern home that offers a fully remodeled space from top to bottom!
Once you step through the front door, you'll immediately be greeted by a spacious and impressive exposed brick stone wall that extends from the living room through the open concept kitchen, adding warmth to the contemporary interior and luxurious hardwood floors.
The kitchen was designed to fulfill all a cook’s needs- luxurious stainless-steel appliance package, spacious quartz stone countertops and designer modern cabinetry. You'll love the amount of natural light that pours in through the large windows.
This property is truly move-in ready, upstairs are two large bedrooms boasting hardwood floors and beautiful ceiling height in both rooms. The master suite brings it all together with beautiful custom tile work, vaulted ceilings with recessed lighting, and a large walk-in closet equipped with an organizer system that just screams organization!
On this floor you will also find a spacious modern bathroom with magnificent vanity and tiled floors, the skylight over the tub completes the lavish look of this space.
The lower level is finished throughout and designed as an extra-large private suite with separated rooms which can easily fit a sitting area as well as a full bedroom suite with an attached powder room.
The large backyard is fenced and has plenty of room for entertaining or just relaxing in privacy. This home is truly full of luxury!
Conveniently located in the Gray’s Ferry/Point Breeze area, this address allows for easy commuting across the Schuylkill River. Within minutes, you will be in the major medical centers of PENN, CHOP, and HUP. If driving to Drexel or UPENN universities or the suburbs and towns off the 676. The neighborhood offers cool and eclectic eateries, grocery shops, local bars, and green parks. Also, a quick ride to Rittenhouse Square, Midtown, Fairmount, the Schuylkill trail, and many of Center City Philadelphia best attractions.
LEASE TERMS-
- $1,985 per month
- Screening application fee $40 per adult- screening includes credit, background, eviction and income
- Required funds to move-in: first month rent, last, and deposit- total of 3 months rent
- Tenants pay all utilities
If interested in this house, please call or text  show contact info
‬.

title: Charming 2BR with option for off-street gated parking
description:
Two-bedroom apartment for rent in the thriving and desirable Fairmount / Spring Garden neighborhood for $1975 per month. Available starting January 15, 2023. Off-street gated parking is an option!
About the apartment:
* On the first floor of a three-story multi-unit apartment building
* Approx 1100 sqft
* Two bedrooms, one bath, and a "Great room" with living room, kitchen, and dining areas
* Washer/dryer located in the bathroom
* High ceilings and decorative fireplace
* Brand new wood floors throughout the apartment
* Plenty of cabinet and closet space
* Each apartment in the building has a large amount of dedicated, lockable storage space in the basement
* Building entry vestibule is perfect for secure delivery of packages
* Near-zero street noise in both bedrooms, and either is perfect for a home office in today's work-from-home environment
* One gated off-street parking spot is available, and is directly accessible from the back door of the apartment. Market rates are $300+, but discounted for tenants of the building at $250 per month.
Very convenient to a number of amenities:
* Just around the corner from the fantastic Fairmount Avenue restaurant scene
* Within a couple of blocks of the building, you can also enjoy the convenience of: multiple coffeehouses, a fresh/prepared food market, Rite Aid, Post Office, Wine and Spirits store, multiple laundromats/dry cleaners, and a very friendly neighborhood gym
* 5 minute walk to Whole Foods
* 8 minute walk to the Art Museum
* 10 minute walk to the Broad Street Line
* 15 minute walk to Center City
* Only 1 block away from the 33 bus which goes directly to/from Center City
About the lease:
* First, last, and security due at time of lease signing
* Background + Criminal check required (minor issues will not disqualify you)
* Credit check required
* Utilities included in the rent: Water/Sewer, Trash/Recycling
* Utilities not included in the rent: Electric/Heat, Cooking gas, Phone/Internet/Cable
* No smokers (non-negotiable!)
* Pets are negotiable
* Multiple options for electronic rent payment available
* Lease term negotiable
More information about the apartment can be found at 2007Wallace -dot- com. This including a video tour, more photos, details about the parking spots, application policies, rental policies, and listings for other open apartments in the building.
If interested in seeing the apartment, please send an email to the Owner/Landlord at jason -at- 2007Wallace -dot- com to schedule an in-person showing.

description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: 1 BR (Large) in Philadelphia
description:
Description
1 year old building with high-end finishes.
New Construction
Completed in November 2021, the Property was constructed by an experienced builder with deep expertise in the local market, featuring high-end residential finishes such as granite counters, stainless steel appliances, undermount sinks with push-button garbage disposals, gooseneck faucets, luxury vinyl plank flooring, in-unit washer/dryers, subway tile backsplashes, oversize closets, spacious bathrooms, and large windows.
The Property contains luxury amenities such as a state-of-the-art intercom system with key-fob entry, ample closet space, and an eco-friendly green roof providing stormwater management and views of Roxborough, Manayunk, Bala Cynwyd and the Schuylkill River.
Transit Oriented
The Property is ¼ mile (a 5-minute walk) to Septa's Wissahickon train station, part of the regional rail line on the popular Manayunk-Norristown Line. It is also less than one mile from the onramp of the City Avenue interchange of I-76, providing convenient access Center City Philadelphia and all of Montgomery County, including all of the region's major office markets.
Thriving Neighborhood
The Roxborough submarket has received a significant influx of high-income renters who remain attracted to the neighborhood's affordability and manageable comminuting times, both to Center City and to suburban white-collar employment centers around Bala Cynwyd and King of Prussia. Additionally, Main Street Manayunk is less than ½ mile from the Property, which offers even more retail, dining and nightlife options including over 50 shops and 30 restaurants.

title: Spacious University City/West Philly 2BR sublet - Available March 1st
description:
This beautiful, spacious 2 bedroom unit in the heart of West Philadelphia. Located a few blocks from the wonderful restaurants and shops of Baltimore Avenue, you’re a short walk from everything you need.
Cost:
$1425/month. Water included in the rent. Some furniture is negotiable.
Availability:
Available March 1st for sublease through June 30th, with the option in April to sign a full year-long lease that would begin on July 1st.
Apartment details:
This apartment can either be used as a two bedroom or as a one bedroom with a spare room for those needing a work-from-home office space. The rooms are spacious, too: the main bedroom is 14.5 ft x 12.5 ft, and the second bedroom/spare room is 11 ft x 11 ft.
The apartment has hardwood floors throughout, high ceilings, an open layout kitchen/living room, and plenty of closet and pantry space. There’s even a cozy sunroom (9 ft x 6 ft) in the back of the unit that can be used as a nice spring/summer reading nook, a plant room, winter storage -- you name it!
There’s also a fantastic backyard space that you have direct access to from the back of your unit -- perfect for summer dinner parties, outdoor hangouts, small-scale gardening, and more.
Location:
Surrounded by cute, tree-lined streets, the apartment is walking distance to tons of amazing food -- Ethiopian, soul food, West African, Laotian, Mediterranean, pizza, a new brewery/winery, donuts, and more.
You’re also a 3 minute walk to the 13 trolley, 5 minute walk from the 34 trolley, both of which take you to 30th Street Station in 10 minutes and Center City in less than 15 minutes!
Want to grab groceries? Your nearest grocery store (Mariposa Food Co-op) and a specialty grocery store with absolutely delicious bahn mi options (Fu-Wah Mini-Market and Deli) are all only a 5 minute walk away!
Looking for outdoor park space? You’re only a 10 minute walk to Clark Park and 15 minute walk from Malcolm X Park
Want to hop on a bike? You’re a five minute walk to the nearest city bike share stall!
Need a place to park your car? It’s always easy to find a free (!) parking spot within a couple minutes’ walk from the apartment (often right in front of the building!)

Description
This newer construction multi-unit property has it all! This spacious unit features living area, kitchen, THREE bedrooms and THREE full baths. The living area has hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, cable and phone jacks. The kitchen features hardwood flooring, dishwasher, garbage disposal, microwave, refrigerator, shaker style cabinets and high end appliances. All bedroom’s feature Berber carpets, closets, cable and phone jacks. Washer and dryer in unit. This is a must see! Owner is a PA Licensed Real Estate Broker.
The property is located in the up and coming West Powelton Neighborhood of Philadelphia, PA, which is conveniently located to and becoming popular for housing Drexel University and University of Pennsylvania students. It is also close to the 16th districts police station which makes it a great location for Drexel and University of Pennsylvania students!
It is located near The Drexel Police department's patrolled area which goes from 30th Street to 36th Street and Chestnut Street to Spring Garden Street. The security officer services contract with Allied Barton Security Services, the largest private security provider in the country. This service provides around the clock security with 125 officers deployed strategically around the campus. There are 24/7 walking escorts available for all Drexel University students and staff within the patrol boundaries. All students, faculty and staff have access to the free Campus Shuttle Services (valid Drexel University ID required), a fast and easy way to travel on and off campus. Drexel Alert is an emergency notification system that provides emergency information in the event of an armed suspect on the campus, a bomb threat or active fire through text, email or by phone. Also included is Drexel Guardian, a free app that allows emergency services to access important information about you, such as your name, picture and last known location in the event of an emergency.
